p: Emodin not only blocks 3a-mediated current, but with the same IC 50 value of about 20 µM the number of viral RNA copies in the medium of infected cells (Fig. 8.19a). The number of RNA copies correlates with the titre (Fig. 8.19b) indicating that the RNA originates from intact viruses. This proves that emodin can act as an antiviral drug and may form the basis for the development of new drugs against coronavirus infection.
